thread.section_title: Beachcamera Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Beachcamera | www.beachcamera.com | 5 of 12
thread.title: Deborah Harrell

author: Deborah Harrell
title: Deborah Harrell
text: I ordered a radar detector for my husband for Christmas. I checked prices from several different sources and found Beach Camera to be the best price. I ordered two laptops after Christmas as well. I checked many sites after the holidays and Beach Camera, again was the best. Orders were received timely and I could not be happier with the service and the prices.
